basic.description:
Survey of digital media theories and online mass communication practices, with emphasis on social and mobile technologies. Course considers the impact of digitalization on the creative and culture industries.
NOTE    Only offered as a distance course. Consult Continuing and Distance Studies.
basic.subject: FILM
basic.title: Digital Media Theory and Practice

extra.enrollment_requirement: Exclusion    No more than 3.0 units from FILM315; FILM260
